name: Vantage Playground
description:
Just a simple sandbox game, play around with shapes and gravity.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can download the source code which means you can change all the code for the game. You can change it's look, you can make objects behave differently, you can change their color. If you don't have any programming experience, we'll make sure to add more updates.

(We're experiencing problems with the MacOS Version of Vantage Playground, source code is suggested.)
